name: The Aberdeen Student Card
description:
Welcome to the Aberdeen Student Card

Coming this freshers' week the card that holds the key to what's on where at any time... And of course the best most relevant student offers!

With your card you'll be able to request the latest offers by text straight to your mobile! Along side the latest offers you'll also get exclusive card holder deals from participating Clubs, Bars and Shops in Aberdeen.

Sounds good huh?! The cards will be widely available during freshers' week 2008 and before via text or "SMS" Just text ASC to 60300 for more details.
